name: ctc-guarantee-balance-postman
description: CTC Guarantee Balance API Postman Tests

scripts.smoke-test: newman run CTC_Guarantee_Balance.postman_collection.json --folder "CTC_GB_Local Smoke Tests" -e Local.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export target/smoke-test-reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export target/smoke-test-reports/index.html
scripts.regression-test: newman run CTC_Guarantee_Balance.postman_collection.json --folder "CTC_GB_Local Regression Tests" -e Local.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export target/regression-test-reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export target/regression-test-reports/index.html
scripts.test: npm run smoke-test && npm run regression-test
